channel.title: Xpiks Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.3.4
item.description:
• Fix spelling does not save changes in Combined Edit dialogs #325
  • UI not updated when checking "Disable FTP passive mode" in the Upload dialog "Advanced" Tab
  • Deadlock in exiv2 v0.25 library fix
  • Combined Edit dialog case issue when combining keywords
  • Keywords count not updated in CombinedEdit-based dialogs on "Clear keywords" action
  • Description/Title spelling errors not updates when removing all but one in CombinedEdit-based
